author: Elijah Kang

changelog.release_notes:
+ Added Pebble 2 support
+ [Text Information] Added HRM
+ [Step Graph] Added HRM as health info.
+ [Update Interval] Now changeable by increments of 5.
+ Changed to stronger vibration for BT Disconnect.

+ Pebble OS4.0 Quick View Support
+ [Text Information] Added Seconds
+ Optimized memory support for Pebble Classic
- [Fixed] Calendar Box Background Color Bug
- [Fixed] Progress Bar Bug

+ BT Disconnect Indicator Toggle
+ Added new date formats
+ Peek Timer (2 - 10 seconds)
+ Countdown and Alt Timezone numbers are smaller
+ Update Interval (15 - 60 minutes)
+ [Calendar] Start of the Week (Monday or Sunday)
+ [Step Graph] Text info is now selectable: Steps, Average, Weekly Highest Steps, Distance, or Calories
- [Fixed] Date Format: Bottom Text Info for DayName
- [Fixed] Configuration Page Show/Hide bugs
- [Fixed] Progress Bar: Did not update if steps was not selected under Text Info

+ Master Key Support: Get all your API keys hassle free! Go to 'pmkey.xyz'
+ Peek Mode: Adds 2 more modules to view with a flick of your wrist!
+ Module: Sleep Graph
+ Module: Travel (First Class account required for API Key. Go to 'travelapp.rocks')
+ Calendar: Static Calendar now available
+ Calendar: The current day is now bordered

+ Font Theme: Large Time for rectangular displays(removes bottom text information) 
+ Date Format: Option to add Day of the week
+ Show Leading Zero
+ Text Info: Day of the week

- Fixed: Digital font alignment
- Fixed: Updates on Step Graph
- Fixed: Wunderground Fixed Location for certain cities
-Added an information guide to the configuration page
-Fixed minor bug causing Step Graph to not update on a new day

description:
$1.50 / 3 day trial

==Overview==
Introducing Modular, the next generation watchface for Pebble! Modular was designed with a simple goal in mind: Focusing on the information that matters to you. Need to keep track of your weekly steps and sleep? Get a quick glance at the upcoming week? Anticipating an upcoming day or deadline? Look at another timezone? Check the weather or your next flight? Remember your habits guilt-free? Get more organized with Modular! Make it yours!

==Features==
-Customize everything to YOUR preferences
-Clean, information dense design provides a satisfying experience!
-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format & imperial / metric units
-BT vibration and indicator
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
-4 font themes: Digital, Smooth, Hybrid, Large Time
-2 progress bar options: Battery or Step Goal
-4 dividers types to help you read how far the progress bar is
-5 text information options: Date, Daily Steps, Battery, Temperature, Day of the Week
-9 modules to choose from: 
  1. Weekly Step Graph
  2. Weekly Sleep Graph
  3. Calendar
  4. Weather
  5. Alternate Timezone
  6. Countdown
  7. Note
  8. MyHabits
  9. Travel Priority Access
-Peek Mode: View 2 more modules at the flick of your wrist
-Quick View Support
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

==Purchase==
You have a 3 day trial to check out all the features Modular has to offer. Your one time purchase extends to all Pebble models using the same Pebble account. Payments are handled by KiezelPay.

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Modular!
